title: Chickasaw National Recreation Area: Other Resources
body: Other Resources       The Goddard Youth Camp Located on the western shore of the Lake of the Arbuckles, the mission of the Goddard Youth Camp is to provide a high-quality, low-cost outdoor environmental education experience for young people utilizing the teaching tools available at the Camp and the dynamic ecology of the Arbuckle Mountains of south central Oklahoma. The National Park Service has a memorandum of understanding with the Goddard Youth Camp giving the camp permission to operate its facility within Chickasaw National Recreation Areaâ€™s boundary. The camp was established as an environmental education facility for the use of nonprofit youth organizations, including area schools.
